short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync and retrieve your browser tabs across devices with Remote Tabs. Access saved tabs anywhere using your username and key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remote Tabs is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by allowing you to sync and access your browser tabs from any device where the extension is installed. With Remote Tabs, you can easily save all your open tabs to your personal account, ensuring that your browsing sessions are always available whenever you need them.

Key Features:
Tab Syncing: Save your current browser tabs to your Remote Tabs account with a simple click. This feature is perfect for users who work across multiple devices or want to preserve their browsing sessions for later use.

Remote Work: Whether youâ€™re at home, in the office, or on the go, Remote Tabs makes it easy to access your work or personal browsing sessions from any location

Secure Access: Set a unique username and key for your account, ensuring that only you can access your saved tabs. This provides an extra layer of security, making sure your tabs are only accessible by you.

User Authentication: Before syncing or loading tabs, users must log in to the extension, ensuring that only authorized users can manage their tabs. This login feature adds an extra layer of security and personalizes the experience.
